specialQualities.text: Immune to any spell or spell-like ability that allows spell resistance.
Body of Lava (Ex): Entering in contact with the Lava Golem instantly inflicts 2d6 Fire Damage.
Disintegrate spell slows the golem (as the slow spell) for 1d6 rounds and deals 1d12 points of damage.
Fire damage heals 1 point of damage for every 3 points of damage it would otherwise deal.
Spit Lava: ranged touch attack, 6d6 fire.
